document_data.name: Mykros
document_data.titles: Commander of the Arcatan Ducal Guard
document_data.mainbody: '''Mykros''' was the commander of the army of [[Arcata]] in [[Damara]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Mykros was the right-hand man of Duke [[William Horgath]]. He was also in league with the [[Barony of Bloodstone]].
document_data.Personality: Mykros was a quiet and observant man. His loyalty was directed to the kingdom as a whole. For this he supported King [[Gareth Dragonsbane]].
